content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: DSDECOD
      operator: equal_to
      value: DEATH
      value_is_literal: true
    - name: DTHFL
      operator: not_equal_to
      value: Y
      value_is_literal: true
Match Datasets:
  - Name: DS
    Keys:
      - USUBJID
Core:
  Id: CORE-000252
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: When DS.DSDECOD is 'DEATH', DTHFL must be 'Y'
Outcome:
  Message: DTHFL is not 'Y' when DS.DECOD is "DEATH"
  Output Variables:
    - USUBJID
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0136
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Indicates the subject died. Should be Y or null. Should
                  be populated even when the death date is unknown.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Specification
                Section: '5.2'
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - SPECIAL-PURPOSE
  Domains:
    Include:
      - DM

json.Description: When DS.DSDECOD is 'DEATH', DTHFL must be 'Y'

Outcome.Message: DTHFL is not 'Y' when DS.DECOD is "DEATH"

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Indicates the subject died. Should be Y or null. Should be populated even when the death date is unknown.
